Name: Magic Missile
Description: Fires a magic missile that always hits its target and does unresistable damage.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires a magic missile that always hits its target and does unresistable damage.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Detect Monsters
Description: Detects all non-invisible monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.
Description translation: Detects all non-invisible monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.

Name: Phase Door
Description: Teleports you randomly up to 10 squares away.
Description translation: Teleports you randomly up to 10 squares away.

Name: Light Area
Description: Lights up all squares in a level-dependant area, and hurts all light-sensitive monsters in the area of effect.  If you are in a room, the entire room will be lit up as well.
Description translation: Lights up all squares in a level-dependant area, and hurts all light-sensitive monsters in the area of effect.  If you are in a room, the entire room will be lit up as well.

Name: Find Traps, Doors & Stairs
Description: Detects all traps, doors, and stairs in the immediate area.
Description translation: Detects all traps, doors, and stairs in the immediate area.

Name: Cure Light Wounds
Description: Cures 15% of your wounds (min 15hp) and heals 20 points worth of cuts.
Description translation: Cures 15% of your wounds (min 15hp) and heals 20 points worth of cuts.

Name: Detect Objects
Description: Detects all objects in the immediate area.
Description translation: Detects all objects in the immediate area.

Name: Identify
Description: Reveals the powers of an object.
Description translation: Reveals the powers of an object.

Name: Reveal Monsters
Description: Detects all monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.
Description translation: Detects all monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.

Name: Detect Treasure
Description: Detects all treasure in the immediate area.
Description translation: Detects all treasure in the immediate area.

Name: Stinking Cloud
Description: Shoots a radius-2 poison ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 poison ball.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: Fires a lightning beam that hurts each monster in its path.
Description translation: Fires a lightning beam that hurts each monster in its path.

Name: Confuse Monster
Description: Attempts to confuse a single monster for a level-dependant duration.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to confuse a single monster for a level-dependant duration.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.

Name: Sleep Monster
Description: Attempts to put to sleep a single monster.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to put to sleep a single monster.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.

Name: Wonder
Description: Invokes a random spell effect.
Description translation: Invokes a random spell effect.

Name: Frost Bolt
Description: Fires a frost bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires a frost bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Acid Bolt
Description: Fires an acid bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires an acid bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Fire Bolt
Description: Fires a fire bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires a fire bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Trap/Door Destruction
Description: Destroys all traps and doors within a 1-square radius of you.
Description translation: Destroys all traps and doors within a 1-square radius of you.

Name: Spear of Light
Description: Fires a beam that lights up each square and hurts each light-sensitive monster in its path.
Description translation: Fires a beam that lights up each square and hurts each light-sensitive monster in its path.

Name: Turn Stone to Mud
Description: Produces a beam that destroys the first section of wall it hits, unless it is a permanent wall.  Each monster caught in the beam that is susceptible to rock remover takes 20+1d30 points of damage.
Description translation: Produces a beam that destroys the first section of wall it hits, unless it is a permanent wall.  Each monster caught in the beam that is susceptible to rock remover takes 20+1d30 points of damage.

Name: Door Creation
Description: A door is created on each empty floor space that is directly adjacent to you.  These doors are closed, but not locked
Description translation: A door is created on each empty floor space that is directly adjacent to you.  These doors are closed, but not locked

Name: Earthquake
Description: Causes a 10-square radius earthquake around you.  Earthquakes may damage monsters and destroy items in some squares in the area of effect.  Artifacts will not be destroyed by this spell.  This spell has no effect when used in the town.
Description translation: Causes a 10-square radius earthquake around you.  Earthquakes may damage monsters and destroy items in some squares in the area of effect.  Artifacts will not be destroyed by this spell.  This spell has no effect when used in the town.

Name: Stair Creation
Description: A stair (going up or down, chosen at random) is created on the space where you are standing.  This will destroy any terrain feature that was there before.  It will also destroy all items currently on the floor where the spell is cast.
Description translation: A stair (going up or down, chosen at random) is created on the space where you are standing.  This will destroy any terrain feature that was there before.  It will also destroy all items currently on the floor where the spell is cast.

Name: Cure Poison
Description: Neutralizes poison.
Description translation: Neutralizes poison.

Name: Heroism
Description: Cures 10 points of damage, removes fear and grants you heroism (resistance to fear, and a bonus of +12 to-hit) for 25+1d25 turns.
Description translation: Cures 10 points of damage, removes fear and grants you heroism (resistance to fear, and a bonus of +12 to-hit) for 25+1d25 turns.

Name: Berserker
Description: Cures 30 points of damage, removes fear, and grants you berserk strength (resistance to fear, a bonus of +24 to-hit, and a penalty of -10 to AC) for 25+1d25 turns.
Description translation: Cures 30 points of damage, removes fear, and grants you berserk strength (resistance to fear, a bonus of +24 to-hit, and a penalty of -10 to AC) for 25+1d25 turns.

Name: Haste Self
Description: Hastes you (+10 to speed) for a level-dependant duration.
Description translation: Hastes you (+10 to speed) for a level-dependant duration.

Name: Teleport Self
Description: Teleports you randomly within the current level.
Description translation: Teleports you randomly within the current level.

Name: Slow Monster
Description: Attempts to slow a single monster.  Uniques are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to slow a single monster.  Uniques are not affected.

Name: Teleport Other
Description: Produces a bolt that teleports the first monster in its path up to 100 squares away.
Description translation: Produces a bolt that teleports the first monster in its path up to 100 squares away.

Name: Teleport Level
Description: Teleports you 1 level up or 1 level down (chosen at random).  This spell has no effect when the option to restrict the use of stairs and recall is set.
Description translation: Teleports you 1 level up or 1 level down (chosen at random).  This spell has no effect when the option to restrict the use of stairs and recall is set.

Name: Word of Recall
Description: Teleports you from the dungeon to the town or from the town to the deepest level you have visited in the dungeon.  The recall effect is not immediate; it is delayed by 14+1d20 turns.  During that delay, the spell can be canceled by invoking the spell of recall again.  This spell has no effect when the option to restrict the use of stairs and recall is set, unless Morgoth is dead.
Description translation: Teleports you from the dungeon to the town or from the town to the deepest level you have visited in the dungeon.  The recall effect is not immediate; it is delayed by 14+1d20 turns.  During that delay, the spell can be canceled by invoking the spell of recall again.  This spell has no effect when the option to restrict the use of stairs and recall is set, unless Morgoth is dead.

Name: Polymorph Other
Description: Attempts to polymorph a single monster.  Uniques are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to polymorph a single monster.  Uniques are not affected.

Name: Shock Wave
Description: Shoots a radius-2 sound ball.  Apart from doing sound damage, this also has a chance to stun each monster in the area of effect.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 sound ball.  Apart from doing sound damage, this also has a chance to stun each monster in the area of effect.

Name: Explosion
Description: Shoots a radius-2 shards ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 shards ball.

Name: Cloudkill
Description: Shoots a radius-3 poison ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-3 poison ball.

Name: Mass Sleep
Description: Attempts to put to sleep each monster within line of sight.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to put to sleep each monster within line of sight.  Uniques and monsters that resist confusion are not affected.

Name: Bedlam
Description: Shoots a radius-4 confusion ball that doesn`t cause physical damage but has a chance to confuse each monster in the area of effect.  Uniques or monsters that resist confusion are not affected.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-4 confusion ball that doesn`t cause physical damage but has a chance to confuse each monster in the area of effect.  Uniques or monsters that resist confusion are not affected.

Name: Rend Soul
Description: Fires a nether bolt that always hits its target. Does not affect undead.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires a nether bolt that always hits its target. Does not affect undead.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Word of Destruction
Description: Destroys everything in a 15-square radius circle around you.  All monsters, objects, and terrain features in the area of effect are destroyed, except stairs and permanent walls.  You will also be blinded for 10+1d10 turns, unless you have resistance to blindness or light.  This spell has no effect when used in the town.
Description translation: Destroys everything in a 15-square radius circle around you.  All monsters, objects, and terrain features in the area of effect are destroyed, except stairs and permanent walls.  You will also be blinded for 10+1d10 turns, unless you have resistance to blindness or light.  This spell has no effect when used in the town.

Name: Chaos Strike
Description: Fires a chaos bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.
Description translation: Fires a chaos bolt that always hits its target.  Sometimes a beam is fired instead that hurts each monster in its path.  The chance to get a beam goes up with your character level.

Name: Resist Cold
Description: Grants you resistance to cold for 20+1d20 turns.
Description translation: Grants you resistance to cold for 20+1d20 turns.

Name: Resist Fire
Description: Grants you resistance to fire for 20+1d20 turns.
Description translation: Grants you resistance to fire for 20+1d20 turns.

Name: Resist Poison
Description: Grants you resistance to poison for 20+1d20 turns.
Description translation: Grants you resistance to poison for 20+1d20 turns.

Name: Resistance
Description: Grants you resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and poison for 20+1d20 turns.
Description translation: Grants you resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and poison for 20+1d20 turns.

Name: Shield
Description: Grants you +50 to AC for 30+1d20 turns.
Description translation: Grants you +50 to AC for 30+1d20 turns.

Name: Rune of Protection
Description: Inscribes a glyph of warding beneath you.  Summoned monsters can`t appear on the glyph.  If a monster attempts to move onto the glyph or melee you while you are standing on the glyph, it must first succeed in breaking the glyph.  Higher level monsters are more likely to break the glyph.  The glyph will remain where it is, until a monster succeeds in breaking it, or until you leave the level.
Description translation: Inscribes a glyph of warding beneath you.  Summoned monsters can`t appear on the glyph.  If a monster attempts to move onto the glyph or melee you while you are standing on the glyph, it must first succeed in breaking the glyph.  Higher level monsters are more likely to break the glyph.  The glyph will remain where it is, until a monster succeeds in breaking it, or until you leave the level.

Name: Lesser Recharging
Description: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.
Description translation: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.

Name: Enchant Armor
Description: Attempts to improve the armour class bonus of a piece of armour.
Description translation: Attempts to improve the armour class bonus of a piece of armour.

Name: Enchant Weapon
Description: Attempts to improve the to-hit bonus and the to-dam bonus of a weapon.
Description translation: Attempts to improve the to-hit bonus and the to-dam bonus of a weapon.

Name: Greater Recharging
Description: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges, but are overall much better than for the spell Lesser Recharging.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.
Description translation: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges, but are overall much better than for the spell Lesser Recharging.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.

Name: Elemental Brand
Description: Brands one stack of ammunition with fire, cold, or poison (selected at random) and at the same time attempts to improve the to-hit bonus and the to-dam bonus of the same ammunition.  The spell has no effect if the ammunition is already branded, has a slay, is broken, or is cursed.
Description translation: Brands one stack of ammunition with fire, cold, or poison (selected at random) and at the same time attempts to improve the to-hit bonus and the to-dam bonus of the same ammunition.  The spell has no effect if the ammunition is already branded, has a slay, is broken, or is cursed.

Name: Frost Ball
Description: Shoots a radius-2 frost ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 frost ball.

Name: Acid Ball
Description: Shoots a radius-2 acid ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 acid ball.

Name: Fire Ball
Description: Shoots a radius-2 fire ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 fire ball.

Name: Ice Storm
Description: Shoots a radius-3 cold ball.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-3 cold ball.

Name: Banishment
Description: Removes all monsters represented by a chosen symbol from the level.  Uniques are not affected.  You take 1d4 points of damage for every monster removed.
Description translation: Removes all monsters represented by a chosen symbol from the level.  Uniques are not affected.  You take 1d4 points of damage for every monster removed.

Name: Meteor Swarm
Description: Shoots a swarm of 3 or 4 meteors.  Meteors will travel until hitting a wall, a monster, or reaching the target location.  Meteors will explode as a radius-1 ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.  If this kills the monster that blocked the path to the target location, the next meteor may continue to find another target.
Description translation: Shoots a swarm of 3 or 4 meteors.  Meteors will travel until hitting a wall, a monster, or reaching the target location.  Meteors will explode as a radius-1 ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.  If this kills the monster that blocked the path to the target location, the next meteor may continue to find another target.

Name: Mass Banishment
Description: Removes all monsters within 20 squares of you.  Uniques are not affected.  You take 1d3 points of damage for every monster removed.
Description translation: Removes all monsters within 20 squares of you.  Uniques are not affected.  You take 1d3 points of damage for every monster removed.

Name: Rift
Description: Fires a gravity beam that hurts each monster in its path and has a chance of teleporting it away.
Description translation: Fires a gravity beam that hurts each monster in its path and has a chance of teleporting it away.

Name: Mana Storm
Description: Shoots a radius-3 mana ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-3 mana ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.

Name: Detect Evil
Description: Detects all evil monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.
Description translation: Detects all evil monsters in the immediate area, for one turn only.

Name: Bless
Description: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 12+1d12 turns.
Description translation: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 12+1d12 turns.

Name: Remove Fear
Description: Removes fear.
Description translation: Removes fear.

Name: Call Light
Description: Lights up all squares in a level-dependant area, and hurts all light-sensitive monsters in the area of effect.  If you are in a room, the entire room will be lit up as well.
Description translation: Lights up all squares in a level-dependant area, and hurts all light-sensitive monsters in the area of effect.  If you are in a room, the entire room will be lit up as well.

Name: Slow Poison
Description: Halves the remaining duration of any current poisoning.
Description translation: Halves the remaining duration of any current poisoning.

Name: Scare Monster
Description: Attempts to scare a single monster for a level-dependant duration.  Uniques and monsters that resist fear are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to scare a single monster for a level-dependant duration.  Uniques and monsters that resist fear are not affected.

Name: Portal
Description: Teleports you randomly over a short distance.
Description translation: Teleports you randomly over a short distance.

Name: Chant
Description: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 24+1d24 turns.
Description translation: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 24+1d24 turns.

Name: Sanctuary
Description: Attempts to put to sleep each monster directly adjacent to you.  Uniques and monsters that resist sleep are not affected.
Description translation: Attempts to put to sleep each monster directly adjacent to you.  Uniques and monsters that resist sleep are not affected.

Name: Satisfy Hunger
Description: Magically renders you well-fed (but not satiated).  This will also cure a bloated stomach.
Description translation: Magically renders you well-fed (but not satiated).  This will also cure a bloated stomach.

Name: Resist Heat and Cold
Description: Gives you temporary resistance to cold and fire, for 10+1d10 turns each.
Description translation: Gives you temporary resistance to cold and fire, for 10+1d10 turns each.

Name: Neutralize Poison
Description: Neutralizes poison.
Description translation: Neutralizes poison.

Name: Orb of Draining
Description: Shoots a radius-2 or radius-3 ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.  Evil monsters take double damage.  All cursed items in the area of effect are destroyed.  The bigger area of effect is attained at character level 30.
Description translation: Shoots a radius-2 or radius-3 ball that does unresistable damage to each monster in its area of effect.  Evil monsters take double damage.  All cursed items in the area of effect are destroyed.  The bigger area of effect is attained at character level 30.

Name: Cure Critical Wounds
Description: Cures 25% of your wounds (min 30hp) and heals all cut damage, poison, amnesia and stunning.
Description translation: Cures 25% of your wounds (min 30hp) and heals all cut damage, poison, amnesia and stunning.

Name: Sense Invisible
Description: Enables you to see invisible monsters for 24+1d24 turns.
Description translation: Enables you to see invisible monsters for 24+1d24 turns.

Name: Protection from Evil
Description: Protects you from evil for a level-dependant duration: all melee attacks by evil monsters have a chance to be repelled, unless the monster`s level is higher than your character level.
Description translation: Protects you from evil for a level-dependant duration: all melee attacks by evil monsters have a chance to be repelled, unless the monster`s level is higher than your character level.

Name: Sense Surroundings
Description: Maps out a portion of the level around you.
Description translation: Maps out a portion of the level around you.

Name: Cure Mortal Wounds
Description: Cures 30% of your wounds (min 50hp), cures all stunning and heals all cut damage, poison and amnesia.
Description translation: Cures 30% of your wounds (min 50hp), cures all stunning and heals all cut damage, poison and amnesia.

Name: Turn Undead
Description: Attempts to scare each undead monster within line of sight, causing it to flee in terror for a level-dependant duration.
Description translation: Attempts to scare each undead monster within line of sight, causing it to flee in terror for a level-dependant duration.

Name: Prayer
Description: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 48+1d48 turns.
Description translation: Blesses you, giving a bonus of +5 to AC and +10 to-hit, for 48+1d48 turns.

Name: Dispel Undead
Description: Inflicts unresistable damage on each undead monster within line of sight.
Description translation: Inflicts unresistable damage on each undead monster within line of sight.

Name: Heal
Description: Cures 35% of your max hp (min 300), cures all stunning and heals all cut damage, poison and amnesia.
Description translation: Cures 35% of your max hp (min 300), cures all stunning and heals all cut damage, poison and amnesia.

Name: Dispel Evil
Description: Inflicts unresistable damage on each evil monster within line of sight.
Description translation: Inflicts unresistable damage on each evil monster within line of sight.

Name: Glyph of Warding
Description: Inscribes a glyph of warding beneath you.  Summoned monsters can`t appear on the glyph.  If a monster attempts to move onto the glyph or melee you while you are standing on the glyph, it must first succeed in breaking the glyph.  Higher level monsters are more likely to break the glyph.  The glyph will remain where it is, until a monster succeeds in breaking it, or until you leave the level.
Description translation: Inscribes a glyph of warding beneath you.  Summoned monsters can`t appear on the glyph.  If a monster attempts to move onto the glyph or melee you while you are standing on the glyph, it must first succeed in breaking the glyph.  Higher level monsters are more likely to break the glyph.  The glyph will remain where it is, until a monster succeeds in breaking it, or until you leave the level.

Name: Holy Word
Description: Inflicts unresistable damage on each evil monster within line of sight, cures 1000 points of damage, cures all stunning, heals all cut damage, neutralizes poison, and removes fear.
Description translation: Inflicts unresistable damage on each evil monster within line of sight, cures 1000 points of damage, cures all stunning, heals all cut damage, neutralizes poison, and removes fear.

Name: Detection
Description: Detects all treasure, objects, doors, stairs, traps, and monsters in the immediate area.
Description translation: Detects all treasure, objects, doors, stairs, traps, and monsters in the immediate area.

Name: Probing
Description: Probes each monster within line of sight, giving information on the current hit points of the monster and many of its characteristics and abilities (excluding its melee, spellcasting, and breath attacks).
Description translation: Probes each monster within line of sight, giving information on the current hit points of the monster and many of its characteristics and abilities (excluding its melee, spellcasting, and breath attacks).

Name: Clairvoyance
Description: Lights up, maps out, and detects all objects on the complete current dungeon level.
Description translation: Lights up, maps out, and detects all objects on the complete current dungeon level.

Name: Cure Serious Wounds
Description: Cures 20% of your wounds (min 25hp) and heals all cut damage.
Description translation: Cures 20% of your wounds (min 25hp) and heals all cut damage.

Name: Healing
Description: Cures 2000 points of damage, cures all stunning and heals all cut damage.
Description translation: Cures 2000 points of damage, cures all stunning and heals all cut damage.

Name: Restoration
Description: Restores to maximum all stats that are currently below maximum.
Description translation: Restores to maximum all stats that are currently below maximum.

Name: Remembrance
Description: Restores experience points to maximum if it is currently below maximum.
Description translation: Restores experience points to maximum if it is currently below maximum.

Name: Banish Evil
Description: Teleports away each evil monster within line of sight.
Description translation: Teleports away each evil monster within line of sight.

Name: Annihilation
Description: Inflicts 200 points of damage on a single monster that is not undead, a demon, an elemental, a golem, or a vortex.
Description translation: Inflicts 200 points of damage on a single monster that is not undead, a demon, an elemental, a golem, or a vortex.

Name: Unbarring Ways
Description: Destroys all traps and doors within a 1-square radius of you.
Description translation: Destroys all traps and doors within a 1-square radius of you.

Name: Recharging
Description: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.
Description translation: Adds charges to a stack of wands or staves.  Chance of success and number of charges gained increase with your level and decrease with level of wand or staff and number of charges.  A failed attempt to recharge destroys one wand or staff from the stack.

Name: Enchant Armour
Description: Attempts to improve the armour class bonus of a piece of armour. Also gives a chance to break a curse.
Description translation: Attempts to improve the armour class bonus of a piece of armour. Also gives a chance to break a curse.

Name: Blink
Description: Teleports you randomly up to 10 squares away.
Description translation: Teleports you randomly up to 10 squares away.

Name: Alter Reality
Description: The current level will be discarded and a new dungeon level (on the same dungeon depth) will be generated.  This has exactly the same side effects as leaving and re-entering the level through a stair, except that you won`t start on a square with a stair.
Description translation: The current level will be discarded and a new dungeon level (on the same dungeon depth) will be generated.  This has exactly the same side effects as leaving and re-entering the level through a stair, except that you won`t start on a square with a stair.
